image.description: Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera

item.title: ‘War criminal’: Arab Americans rebuff Biden campaign outreach over Gaza

description.#cdata-section: US Arab officials in swing state of Michigan say they will not discuss 2024 elections with Gaza 'genocide unfolding'.

item.title: Will Israel obey the ruling of the UN’s top court?

description.#cdata-section: The International Court of Justice (ICJ) has ordered Israel to prevent acts of genocide in Gaza.

item.title: US, Iraq begin formal talks on winding down US-led military coalition

description.#cdata-section: There are about 2,500 US troops still deployed in Iraq as part of the coalition formed in 2014 to help defeat ISIL.

item.title: ‘Stop killing us!’: Thousands march to protest against femicide in Kenya

description.#cdata-section: The demonstration was the largest-event ever against sexual and gender-based violence in the country.

item.title: ‘Taiwan independence’ an obstacle to China-US relations, says Beijing

description.#cdata-section: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi and US National Security Adviser Jake Sullivan met to discuss bilateral relations.

item.title: Gunmen kill nine Pakistani nationals in southeastern Iran

description.#cdata-section: The shootings come as Tehran and Islamabad work to normalise ties after recent tit-for-tat attacks.

item.title: Cold, rainy weather making war-wracked Gaza ‘completely uninhabitable’

description.#cdata-section: UN’s human rights office warns about the impact of continued bombardment and worsening weather on civilians in Gaza.

item.title: Venezuela court disqualifies leading opposition presidential candidate

description.#cdata-section: Maria Corina Machado had declared victory in the Venezuelan opposition’s presidential primary last October.

item.title: Why Lula has failed to address the Yanomami genocide

description.#cdata-section: The crisis in Indigenous lands in Brazil has deep roots and cannot be resolved with half-measures.

item.title: Wildfires rage near Colombia’s capital as temperatures soar

description.#cdata-section: Forest fires have destroyed more than 17,000 hectares, with blazes burning kilometres from Bogota's residential areas.

item.title: Palestinians condemn suspension of UNRWA funding by Western nations

description.#cdata-section: Australia, UK, US and others halt support after Israel accused UNRWA staff of involvement in Hamas's October 7 attacks.

item.title: Packed Tanzania protests offer hope but reforms remain a distant dream

description.#cdata-section: Tanzanian opposition has sought constitutional reforms for 30 years but questions remain about whether they can succeed.

item.title: Brutality of oppression: Ai Weiwei speaks on Gaza, China and New York City

description.#cdata-section: 'Speak your thoughts loudly and without considering the consequences,' says the artist.

item.title: Femicide in Kenya: What’s causing an epidemic of violence against women?

description.#cdata-section: Activists call for government to act following a series of brutal murders of women in January.

item.title: WWE’s Vince McMahon resigns after sexual assault and trafficking lawsuit

description.#cdata-section: Former employee files lawsuit accusing McMahon and another executive of sexual assault, trafficking and emotional abuse.

item.title: How Israel is responding to the ICJ ruling

description.#cdata-section: The ICJ's order to Israel to stop acts of genocide marks a watershed in the Gaza war.

item.title: UN Security Council to discuss ICJ ruling in Israel genocide case

description.#cdata-section: Top UN court ordered Israel to prevent acts of genocide against Palestinians but didn't call for a ceasefire.

item.title: ‘Israel’s supporters have been put on notice’, say experts on ICJ verdict

description.#cdata-section: But ultimately, only Israel has the power to stop the bombardment of Gaza.

item.title: US military destroys Houthi antiship missile after oil tanker attack

description.#cdata-section: US says missile presented an 'imminent threat' to merchant ship and US Navy vessels in the region.

item.title: US approves sale of F-16 fighter jets to Turkey

description.#cdata-section: The $23bn deal was finalised after Turkey's parliament ratified Sweden's long-delayed NATO membership.

item.title: ‘Like a mafia’: Israeli settlers, forces squeeze Palestinian shepherds out

description.#cdata-section: Palestinian farmers face heightened campaign of intimidation by illegal settlers, confiscations and detentions.

item.title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 703

description.#cdata-section: As the war enters its 703rd day, these are the main developments.

item.title: Israel’s war on Gaza: List of key events, day 113

description.#cdata-section: Top UN court orders Israel to prevent acts of genocide in Gaza; US and UK conduct new attacks on Houthi targets.

item.title: Tuvalu’s pro-Taiwan leader loses seat in closely watched election

description.#cdata-section: Tuvalu is one of only 12 remaining diplomatic allies of Taipei amid growing US-China rivalry in the Pacific.

item.title: Has the war on Gaza hurt Israel’s economy?

description.#cdata-section: While some sectors like tech have continued to see activity, others like tourism and construction have nosedived.
